connection_failed.title: Evon Smart Home connection failed
connection_failed.description:
The integration has failed to connect to your Evon Smart Home system {failures} times in a row.

Last error: {error}

Please check:
- Your Evon system is powered on and connected to the network
- The host URL in the integration configuration is correct
- Your network allows connections to the Evon system

The integration will automatically recover when the connection is restored.

confirm.title: Stale entities were removed

config_migration_failed.title: Evon configuration migration failed
config_migration_failed.description:
Your Evon Smart Home configuration was created with a newer version of the integration (version {current_version}) and cannot be used with the current version (supports up to version {supported_version}).

Please update the Evon Smart Home integration to the latest version, or remove and re-add the integration.

init.title: Evon Smart Home Options
init.description: To change connection credentials, use **Reconfigure** from the integration menu.

data_description.sync_areas: Automatically assign devices to Home Assistant areas based on their room assignment in the Evon system. Note: Changing this option will reload the integration.
data_description.non_dimmable_lights: Select lights that should be treated as on/off only (no dimming). Useful for LED strips connected via PWM dimmers that need full power. Note: Changing this option will reload the integration.

data_description.http_only: Disable WebSocket and use HTTP polling only. WebSocket is recommended for instant state updates. Only enable this if you experience connection issues with WebSocket. Note: Changing this option will reload the integration.
data_description.scan_interval: How often to fetch device states via HTTP polling. Only used as fallback when WebSocket is enabled, or as primary method when HTTP only mode is enabled.

data_description.button_double_click_delay: Time to wait after a button release before firing a single press event. A longer delay improves double-press detection but makes single presses feel slower. Range: 0.2â€“1.4 seconds.

data_description.max_recording_duration: Maximum duration for camera recordings in seconds (30-3600). Prevents forgotten recordings from filling up disk space.
data_description.recording_output_format: Choose whether to save only the MP4 video, or also keep individual JPEG frames.

data_description.debug_api: Enable debug logging for HTTP API requests and responses. Useful for troubleshooting connection or authentication issues.
data_description.debug_websocket: Enable debug logging for WebSocket messages. Useful for troubleshooting real-time update issues.
data_description.debug_coordinator: Enable debug logging for the data coordinator. Useful for troubleshooting data processing and entity updates.
